blogPost.excerpt: Discover aggregate data on average startup valuations and revenue multipliers in 55 industry groups, based on real data sourced from 200,000+ deals. Learn who are the top VC investors in rounds like yours.
blogPost.body: Discover aggregate data on average startup valuations and revenue multipliers in 55 industry groups, based on real data sourced from 200,000+ deals. Learn who are the top VC investors in rounds like yours.
blogPost.title: Startup Valuation Nest - Check startup valuations and multipliers in your industry
blogPost.author: Anna Scherbak

localize.description: 根据来自200,000多个交易的真实数据，发现55个行业组的创业公司平均估值和收入乘数的汇总数据。了解像你这样的几轮融资中，谁是最顶尖的风投投资者。
localize.tagline: 查看您所在行业的初创公司估值和乘数

localize.description: 根據來自200,000多個交易的真實數據，發現55個行業組的創業公司平均估值和收入乘數的彙總數據。瞭解像你這樣的幾輪融資中，誰是最頂尖的風投投資者。
localize.tagline: 查看您所在行業的初創公司估值和乘數

previous.excerpt: Pick the change that matters to you. Personalize, email, print, or mail your greeting card in seconds — a meaningful gift that never disappoints.
previous.title: BlueQ - Instant world changing gifts everybody loves

localize.description: 选择对你来说重要的改变。在几秒钟内个性化、通过电子邮件发送、打印或邮寄贺卡-这是一份永远不会让人失望的有意义的礼物。
localize.tagline: 瞬间改变世界的礼物人人都喜欢

localize.description: 選擇對你來說重要的改變。在幾秒鐘內個性化、通過電子郵件發送、打印或郵寄賀卡-這是一份永遠不會讓人失望的有意義的禮物。
localize.tagline: 瞬間改變世界的禮物人人都喜歡

next.excerpt: RetentionX translates your data into clear actions. Take the best business decisions based on AI-driven data analysis and replace the power of an entire data science team with just one, easy-to-use tool.
next.title: RetentionX - AI for Shopify

localize.description: RetentionX将您的数据转换为清晰的操作。基于人工智能驱动的数据分析做出最佳业务决策，并用一个简单易用的工具取代整个数据科学团队的力量。
RetentionX將您的數據轉換爲清晰的操作。基於人工智能驅動的數據分析做出最佳業務決策，並用一個簡單易用的工具取代整個數據科學團隊的力量。
